alert.note: Alert for Amite; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:21PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wilkinson and west central Amite Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Dolorosa to Centreville. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Woodville, Gloster and Dolorosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
